data.title: Full List of 2013 Foreword INDIES Finalists
data.meta_description: These are the best of the best, the cream of the crop, the cherries on top a metaphorical ice cream sundae of indie books. The full list of finalists for the 2013 Foreword INDIES Book of the Year Awards.
